basics.name: Victor Garcia Mestre
basics.label: Full Stack developer who loves crafting great web experiences ✨ and exploring bleeding-edge technologies.
basics.summary: Passionate web developer with a background in Electrical Engineering. My journey into web development began when I helped create a solar power monitoring application at a startup. Inspired by this experience, I made the decision to transition from electrical engineering to web development and haven't looked back since. I am a driven and diligent problem-solver with a strong interest incontinuous learning and self-improvement.

work.name: ComplyCloud
work.summary: Worked on several key features in our web application built with Next.js. Recently, I've transitioned into a full-stack position where I've taken on the responsibility of developing the backend using .NET framework. This shift has allowed me to take ownership of features from conception to deployment, ensuring seamless integration and end-to-end functionality. I also led some initiatives to improve the overall performance and developer experience such as:
highlights: Revamped our client-server state synchronization with React Query.
Overhauling the authentication on the client side using AWS services.
Developing a comprehensive library of React styled components aligned with our design system.
Transitioning email notifications to styled templates to boost customer engagement.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Collaborated with a local store with their marketing and e-commerce using Adobe Commerce (Magento) as the CMS and CRM, while concurrently expanding my education in web development through relevant courses and bootcamps.

work.name: European Energy
highlights: Managed the day-to-day operations of solar power plants across Europe, maintaining close communication with O&M providers.
Evaluated and supervised preventive and corrective maintenance activities.
Facilitated the submission of required documentation to regulatory bodies.
Oversaw insurance claims processes.

work.name: GreenGo Energy
highlights: Developed Python-based backend solutions to continuously monitor the condition of solar power plants, aggregating extensive datasets and calculating critical performance metrics for failure detection and diagnosis.
Maintained the SQL database responsible for storing monitored data and plant specifications, ensuring data accuracy and accessibility.

Successfully commissioned electrical installations and IT systems for power plants, as well as supervised repair activities and conducted routine inspections to guarantee the functionality and safety of power plant operations
Managed technical documentation and coordinated warranty claims with equipment manufacturers, ensuring timely resolution of issues.
Took charge of technical customer support, delivering assistance and solutions to meet customer needs.

volunteer.summary: Volunteered as a Game Playtester, participating in recurring playtest sessions to provide feedback for game development purposes. Contributed insights and observations to assist in refining game mechanics, identifying bugs, and enhancing user experience.
